page.title: 10 HOUSING
page.content: In terms of housing the District offers a wide choice for an employer and key personnel whose firm may be setting up or expanding in the area. It ranges from cheaper Victorian and Edwardian properties in some of the older communities to larger,expensive inter-war and modern houses in extensive grounds in Cannock. Good quality, modern housing is available or being built on pleasant new estates in such places as Hawks Green. On this estate and on smaller developments within older communities the range varies from two bedroomed houses and bungalows to 3 & 4 bedroomed detached houses. House prices are very reasonable and ae in easy reach of beautiful countryside-Cannock Chase.
